overview: Fun, witty and filled with laughs, El Diario de Una Pasante, Nominated at the Malaga Spanish Film Festival 2003, takes us on a fresh and exciting new journey into the workplace with a young and hip group of interns who dare to walk in with a bang! Ana finds herself a summer job as an intern for CCN, a radio station, along with several other graduates. But the working environment isn't all its caught up to be... at least it's not what they had in mind. Overbearing and demanding supervisors who will make their lives impossible, make them realize soon enough the difficulty of getting a real job once the internship comes to an end. Ana, intelligent and remarkably funny, decides to take full leadership in rebelling with the other interns. Prepare yourself for a rollercoaster of hilarious situations in which love, jealousy and way too much partying takes place!
title: Diario de una becaria
